questions.quote: Because I'm going to be playing golf at the Westchester country club. Mmh.
Yeah I better get to a doctor, bye.  That was close! What drives me to take chances like that?
Well, I guess it started about twenty years ago when I got back from Viet Nam, and this was the only friend I had left.
George, do you realize that Rava has asked me to edit her book?
No, that's a fair question. It is, uhm...  Jerry, yeah.  Jerry's a friend of mine.  He uh, he gave it to me. Unbelievable how many addresses of people this guy has.
I had to give him a tissue. In fact, let me call his machine now and I'll just make up some excuse why I can't go to the game either.
Yeah, yeah. Stick.  'Cos I could still go to the coffee shop.
That would be good too. The idea is combine the this and the that. But this cannot be disturbed.
She knows that I have her clock. I know that she has my hat. I think she's getting ready to make an exchange.
Yeah, I know the guy. I take my stuff in there all the time. Yeah, I bet I can get your watch back by tomorrow morning.
